article_title: Roanoke Rapids police looking for two involved in business break-in - WITN
article_description: Police are looking for two men they say broke into a business and damaged several items
article_content: ROANOKE RAPIDS  NC  WITN    Police are looking for two people they say broke into a business and damaged several items Roanoke Rapids police say two people broke into the business located at 510 Jackson Street  They were caught on surveillance camera Poli   186 chars
